name: Gravity Waves
description:
Gravity Waves is a fast paced, frantic twin stick shoot 'em up in space with realistic gravity against enemies which come in waves. Due to the gravity shots come in from all directions.



The gravity takes a little getting used to but it provides gameplay that changes moment by moment and totally keeps you on your toes.

Gain extra points for close-up kills and using planets, moons and the sun to slingshot you with their gravity.



Key features:
  • wave based shooter
  • realistic gravity and orbits
  • old school arcade action
  • builds from simple encounters to fast paced, quickly changing action
  • music by @remixedcat
